issue.title: Server Side Compression not working when sending Accept-Encoding with multiple values separately

labels.name: for: external-project
labels.description: For an external project and not something we can fix

repository.name: spring-boot
repository.description: Spring Boot helps you to create Spring-powered, production-grade applications and services with absolute minimum fuss.

issue.body:
Server Side Compression not working when sending Accept-Encoding with multiple values separately

Here is my application yml

```
server:
  port: 8193
  servlet:
    context-path: /web
  compression:
    enabled: true
    min-response-size: 1024
```


When sending request as like this server compress response 

```
	Url: http://localhost:8193/web/demo/1

	Request Headers:
	Accept-Encoding:deflate, gzip, br


	Response Headers:
		
	KEY: VALUE
	Content-Type: application/json;charset=UTF-8
	Transfer-Encoding: chunked
	Content-Encoding: gzip
	Vary: Accept-Encoding
```

**But when sending request as separate gzip headers, then response is not compressed**

```
	Url: http://localhost:8193/web/demo/1

	Headers:
	Accept-Encoding:deflate
	Accept-Encoding:gzip

	Response Headers:

	KEY:VALUE
	Content-Type:application/json;charset=UTF-8
	Content-Length:8540
	Vary:Accept-Encoding

```

I have also attached sample project

Refer Here

[muzwebdemo.zip](https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-boot/files/3586668/muzwebdemo.zip)

body: @wilkinsona sounds like a bug... are you interested in providing a PR ?

@normanmaurer  Hi, problem that we handle only first `accept-encoding` header value, also we need to consider the q-value for each, or combine to one header-value by spec https://www.w3.org/Protocols/rfc2616/rfc2616-sec4.html#sec4.2
@amizurov @wilkinsona  I more then happy to review PRs ... Currently I am a bit busy so I will put this on my backlog if no-one else will fix it in the meantime
@normanmaurer No problem if @wilkinsona don't mind I will do a pull request soon.
@amizurov If you have the time then please go ahead. If not, I should have some cycles later this week once we've released Spring Boot 2.2 M6.

issue.title: Fix HttpContentEncoder does not handle multiple Accept-Encoding

repository.name: netty
repository.description: Netty project - an event-driven asynchronous network application framework

issue.body:
Motivation:
At the current moment `HttpContentEncoder` handle only first value of multiple `accept-encoding` headers.

Modification:

Join multiple `accept-encoding` headers to one separated by comma.

Result:

Fixes #9553
